verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) Those who trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> Are as Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> which cannot <S%H3808><s%> be moved, <S%H4131><s%> but abides <S%H3427><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

As the mountains <S%H2022><s%> surround <S%H5439><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> surrounds <S%H5439><s%> His people <S%H5971><s%> From this <S%H6258><s%> time <S%H6258><s%> forth and forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

For the scepter <S%H7626><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%> shall not rest <S%H5117><s%> upon the land <S%H1486><s%> of the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> That the righteous <S%H6662><s%> may not put <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> to do wrong. <S%H9390><s%>
Do <S%H3190><s%> good, <S%H3190><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to those who <S%H2896><s%> are good, <S%H2896><s%> And to those who <S%H3477><s%> are upright <S%H3477><s%> in their hearts. <S%H3820><s%>

But as for those who turn <S%H5186><s%> aside <S%H5186><s%> to their crooked <S%H6128><s%> ways, <S%H6128><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will lead <S%H1980><s%> them away with the doers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity. <S%H205><s%> Peace <S%H7965><s%> be upon Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
